vn.map4d.map.core.gestures

Class StandardGestureDetector

  • java.lang.Object
    • vn.map4d.map.core.gestures.BaseGesture<StandardGestureDetector.StandardOnGestureListener>
      • vn.map4d.map.core.gestures.StandardGestureDetector

  • @UiThread
public class StandardGestureDetector
extends BaseGesture<StandardGestureDetector.StandardOnGestureListener>
    Detector that wraps GestureDetectorCompat.

      static interface  StandardGestureDetector.StandardOnGestureListener
      Listener that merges GestureDetector.OnGestureListener and GestureDetector.OnDoubleTapListener.
